title: Can Tadej Pogačar Win Everything in 2024? ‘Tadej will Focus on Winning Every Race’
content:
UAE star is targeting the Giro d'Italia and Tour de France, but it doesn't stop there: 'Tadej will focus on winning his first race of the season, and the last.'

Read the full article at Can Tadej Pogačar Win Everything in 2024? ‘Tadej will Focus on Winning Every Race’ on Velo.
author: ahood
